message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. I'm willing to give you a 10% discount if you buy it now. If you don't buy it, I'll sell it to someone else for the full price. The product is in excellent condition, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with it.
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I need more information about the product before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. Let me provide you with some data. I've sold 50 high-quality products in the past 6 months, and the average price they sold for is $120. This product is in the same condition as those, and I'm offering it to you for $100. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to someone else for at least $100, and I'd rather it go to you at this price.
I'm more convinced now. The data you provided helps me understand the value of the product. I'll take the 10% discount and buy the product for $90.

I'm glad you decided to take the deal on the previous product! Now, let me be transparent with you about this new product. I've had some issues with this particular batch, and I'm being upfront with you about it. The quality isn't up to par, and I'm offering it to you for the full $100. However, I'm willing to throw in a free accessory that's worth $20, which will make up for the difference in quality.

I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not willing to pay full price for a low-quality product. The free accessory is a nice gesture, but it's not enough to make up for the difference in value. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your decision on the previous product, Bob. I respect your willingness to make informed decisions. Now, let's get back to this high-quality product. I'll sweeten the deal by offering you a 15% discount, bringing the price down to $85. Additionally, I'll include a 1-year warranty on this product, which is a $20 value. This way, you'll have peace of mind knowing that you're protected in case anything goes wrong.
The discount and warranty are attractive, and I'm willing to take the risk. I'll take the product at the discounted price of $85.

I'm glad you're satisfied with the previous purchase, Bob! Now, let me ask you a question: are you willing to consider buying a second high-quality product at the same price of $100, or do you want to take a chance on a potentially lower price? I'm open to negotiations, and I'm confident that you'll be happy with this product as well.
I'm not sure I want to take on the risk of buying another high-quality product at the same price. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making a decision.

I understand your caution, Bob. Now, let's take a look at this new product. I'll be upfront with you - this one is also a low-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for the full $100. However, I'll give you a unique opportunity to make a deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 'get out of one free' voucher, which you can use on any future product, regardless of quality. This way, you'll have a chance to get a high-quality product for the same price, and you'll only be out the cost of one low-quality product.
I'm intrigued by the 'get out of one free' voucher. It's a unique opportunity to mitigate the risk of buying a low-quality product. I'll take the chance and buy the product for $100.

I'm glad you took the chance on the previous product, Bob! Now, let's get back to this high-quality product. Considering you've already used your 'get out of one free' voucher, I'm willing to offer you an even better deal. I'll give you a 20% discount on this product, bringing the price down to $80. Additionally, I'll throw in a premium service package, which includes expedited shipping and dedicated support, worth $30. This way, you'll get an excellent product, great service, and a fair price.
The discount and premium service package are very attractive. I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product at the discounted price of $80.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase, Bob! Now, let's talk about this new high-quality product. Considering you've had success with the previous two high-quality products, I'm willing to offer you a loyalty discount. I'll give you an additional 5% off the already discounted price of $80, bringing it down to $76. Additionally, I'll include a personalized thank-you gift, which is a $20 value. This way, you'll get an excellent product, a great price, and a small token of appreciation for being a valued customer.
The loyalty discount and personalized thank-you gift are very nice gestures. I'm willing to take the chance and buy the product at the discounted price of $76.

This package is normally a $50 value, so you'll be getting an incredible deal. What do you say, Bob?
The 30% discount and premium support package are a fantastic offer. I'm willing to take the chance and buy the product at the discounted price of $50.
